question_text: Which of the following statements are true of always-on VPNs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They provide a continuous encrypted link for the device
They eliminate the need for encryption
They connect automatically when the device starts
They require user intervention to begin each session
They are often used for mobile and remote workforces
correct_answer: They provide a continuous encrypted link for the device
They connect automatically when the device starts
They are often used for mobile and remote workforces
